title: I ask for thunderbird help and get this: If you need help with Mozilla Thunderbird, you can visit the Thunderbird Support Forum or the Thunderbird Support Articles.  which brings right back here.  you are worse than windows.
content: I ask for help with thunderbird and you send me this: If you need help with Mozilla Thunderbird, you can visit the Thunderbird Support Forum or the Thunderbird Support Articles. which brings me right back here. You are worse than windows.
